architectural_notes: Motoko: do not call e.primaryMuscleGroup.toLower(); use Text.toLowercase(...) and Text.equal(...) when filtering exercises by primaryMuscleGroup vs group (in buildShuffledSectionFromArray).
known_issues: buildShuffledSectionFromArray uses invalid Motoko filter syntax (e.primaryMuscleGroup.toLower()), causing Full Body group filtering to fail; must use Text.toLowercase/Text.equal.

existing_features.title: Produce and deploy a new draft build with version number 350 or higher after applying the backend filter fix.

projectName: Fix Motoko filter syntax in buildShuffledSectionFromArray (draft 350 rebuild)
